Hi evp-itc@yahoogroups.com,

I invited you to join Facebook a while back an=
d wanted to remind you that once you join, we'll be able to connect online,=
 share photos, organize groups and events, and more.

Thanks,
Mick's

To si=
gn up for Facebook, follow the link below:
http://www.facebook.com/p.php?i=

Facebook's o=
ffices are located at 1601 S. California Ave., Palo Alto, CA 94304.
